Title: Provides that a person who leaves the scene of a motor vehicle accident that caused the death of a person or persons shall be presumed to have had a blood alcohol content of .18
Summary: Provides that a person who leaves the scene of a motor vehicle accident that caused the death of a person or persons shall be presumed to have had a blood alcohol content of .18 at the time of the accident.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to leaving the scene of a motor vehicle accident that caused the death of a person or persons
